hotelAndEvent.title: Hotel and event
hotelAndEvent.include: Accommodation at the official WLDC hotel with access to all WLDC events on the day the hotel is purchased, buffet breakfast
hotelAndEvent.notInclude: Gala dinner on Friday, February 9, 2024, competition categories, lunches and dinners, airfare and transfers

fullPass.title: Full Pass
fullPass.include: Access to all activities from February 5 to 11 such as: concert, parties, workshops, conferences, competition, Grand Final, Ultimate Championship, Music Park Fest, Pool Parties, Beaches and Gym
fullPass.notInclude: VIP Pool parties, Gala Dinner, special Bootcamp with international teachers, competition categories
fullPass.important: All competitors must have a Full Pass to access the event

passPerDay.title: Pase por día
